short_description: jd building solutions is a home builders & renovation contractor based in christchurch, new zealand.
long_description: through our years of experience working in the christchurch building industry we have identified the common issues that are in counted when helping our client's achieve a home that they our proud of. we are constantly working on and improving our in house systems to ensure communication, a timely completion date, and most importantly a great finish. we also have a reliable network of subcontractors like plumbers and electricians. project management = all-in-one service. our experience has taught us that in house project management is preferred on all projects that jd building solutions takes on. jd building solutions is a local canterbury company, with lots of family roots in christchurch and surrounds. and to do our bit towards providing training and jobs for future of our industry , we're also hiring carefully selected apprentices. using our own staff also means we know exactly who we're sending into your home, whether it's for repairs, renovations or alterations. previous clients have told us we're 'good to have in the house'.

generated_description: jd building solutions, legally known as jd building solutions ltd., is a construction company based in christchurch, canterbury. the company specializes in insurance repairs, classic and architectural projects, new builds, alterations, and renovations. jd building solutions employs trade-qualified carpenters, painters, and a reliable network of subcontractors to ensure high-quality workmanship. the company emphasizes in-house project management to deliver quality results and a stress-free experience for clients. jd building solutions is led by jason donaldson, a licensed building practitioner with over 15 years of experience in the industry. the company is committed to providing excellent service and ensuring client satisfaction through continuous training and support for its staff.
